programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Indris Seid Yimer and Emyet Assen Worakis lives have been utterly transformed in the last thirty years. In 1984, they, their families and their community were engulfed in famine and devastation, a famine memorably described by BBC journalist Michael Buerk as "the closest thing to hell on Earth". Set in the Wollo area, the epicentre of the 1984 famine, the film tells their story. Other contributions featured are from people like entrepreneur Samuel Alemu and financier Ermyas Amelga. It also showcases the hauntingly beautiful UNESCO World Heritage site in Lalibela.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Knutsford and investigate a former Crown Court. Multiple people have been sentenced to death and life in prison, but will the team encounter any of its former inmates tonight?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The Saints come marching in as we tour the iconic St. Louis Cathedral and the mysterious Ursuline Convent in New Orleans. We delve into Mardi Gras history at Mardi Gras World and visit the National WWII Museums world class collection.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is definitely the land of the elephant. Large herds of pachyderms roam this marshy park putting on a show for whoever wants to watch. But thats not the only big boys of this park—buffalo, lion and a host of hoofed game make this a wonder to behold.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This ancient ruined city, lost to history, was one of the most powerful in the world during its prime. The architectural sophistication and sheer size will amaze. Then Journeys heads out to the deep ocean for some big game fishing. Will we land the big one or return empty handed?

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of the strangest Cessna in the whole of Venezuela. Vittorio, a man who feels that his personal space is more in the air rather than on the round, is taking us from the North to the South, leaving from Gran Roque Island. We first fly over the Los Roques archipelago, to then land on a runway made of sand, on the island of La Tortuga, a long strip of land and sand that is inhabited only by a few fishermen. Flying again we follow the waterways of this region and re-fuel in Ciudad Bolivar, a city on the banks of the great Orinoco river, we then fly over the vast and savage territory of the Gran Sabana dominated by the Tepuy and the famous Canaima waterfall, until we reach our final destination: The Salto Angel, the highest waterfall in the world, which is named after its discoverer, the pilot Jimmy Angel, the idol of our friend Vittorio.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In this incredible eco-system of mangroves, reefs and sandy sea beds of the labyrinth of small islands and channels that make up the archipelago of Los Jardines de la Reina, in Cuba, you can find marine birds, many different species of fish and mammals native to this area such as the hutia. However, the main attraction of this place are the sharks that come here to feed in great numbers. So in the company of an expert diver Noel and a biologist Andrea, we meet the two principle species of shark that populate these waters: the silk sharks, Noels faithful playmates and the most feared, the Caribbean reef shark. Noel takes us underwater water scuba-diving with Andrea in apnoea: they both show us that these sharks are not dangerous.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were headed upstate to Albany and Saratoga Springs. Well take the Albany capital tour and see five former NY governors who would become US Presidents. Then, well board the USS Slater and see how America defended its fleet against German U-boats in WWII. Well sample the mineral water in Saratoga Springs, and bet the farm at their famous thoroughbred raceway. Then, well learn how important the Battle of Saratoga was for Americas future at Saratoga battlefield.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: A visit to the Island of Tahiti together with a local called Alphonse who, as well as acquainting us with the famous canoe race Hawaiki Nui Vaa, he also takes us to the central market of Papeete and to visit inland Tahiti - with it green, lush hills and mountains and to show us the gifts of this land and the beauty of the Polynesian sea. We then go to Raiatea, the biggest island of French Polynesia, where on board a catamaran we dive to explore the Polynesian sea beds and sail along the coast to arrive to Taputapuatea, the largest Marae in Polynesia. The Marae are places of worship where the Gods are honored, and they are also important cultural, political and social centers, where they used to prepare for war, elect their leaders and also carry out human sacrifices. Finally we go to Motu Nao Nao to watch the sun go down, a small island, dotted here and there with coconut palms, lapped by the waters of the lagoon and surrounded by a ring of coral reef where the strong waves break over it, creating an amazing atmosphere.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Rv Explorers
programme.desc: RV Explorers, chasing 100 Sunsets. A TV show following a new motorhoming couple as they explore the towns and regions of NZ - experiencing various tourist attractions, events and joining in with other motorhomers to experience their favourite activities.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina has the fortune of visiting one of the top 10 safari lodges in the world and arguably the finest game reserve on earth: SINGITA PAMUSHANA, in the Malilangwe conservation trust. Karina describes the beautiful lodge and wines and dines in style. Karina experiences mating lions. Karinas adventurous guide Craig Van Zyl leads her to a grumpy black rhino that frazzles her nerves. Craig persuades Karina to observe elephants while they enjoy themselves wallowing in the mud, and they spend a night sleeping under the stars.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina and Craig venture to the untamed Mana pools National park with Classic Africa Safaris in Zimbabwe. They camp in luxury safari tents on the bank of the mighty Zambezi river! This place, and the adventures that come with it, are absolutely amazing as Karina is nudged by a bull elephant and charged by a male lion! They canoe down the awesome Zambezi river, and finally get a chance to relax as they drink a sundowner in the fading light.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: Spanish is one of the languages that Sorin speaks, so when it comes to countries that he visits for Travel by Dart, a Latino region is a gift. This episode features the only country in the world that doesnt have an army but provides a million happy adventures in between. Mihailovici jumps into a series of adrenaline-rushed activities, from getting to the hardest-to-access waterfall in the world to ziplining and ATV riding. While in Costa Rica, Sorin also finds himself in a crazy, magnetic field, in the middle of nowhere, as his car starts moving by itself up the hill. To sweeten up the things, a full-body massage in chocolate is a bucket list item that finally comes true during the filming of this episode. This incredible scenery brings visual treats to the viewers. It educates them on how Costa Rica and its equatorial climate became a top attraction for the rest of the world after the pandemic. Pura Vida!

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand. Although it might seem that there is not that much to see on Fuerteventura, the opposite is true. You just have to look for something completely different from other, more touristy places. The remarkable local sites are more of a natural nature than of a historical character. In 2009 the island received the status of UNESCO Nature Reserve. Fuerteventura is first and foremost an island of beautiful and infinitely long beaches. They are all so big that you will always find peace and quiet there. Fuerteventura has its special, indescribable atmosphere. You just have to experience it!

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: When Portuguese seafarers discovered the island of Madeira in 1419, it was completely uninhabited and covered with impenetrable forests. They rolled up their sleeves and got to work. They built canals called "levadas" to distribute water from the islands mountainous center all over the rest of the island. Over a thousand kilometers of them are now walkable, allowing you to get to wild, remote locations with waterfalls and incredible panoramas. Madeira is located in the path of the Gulf Stream, thanks to which it isnt just green, but blooming, all year round.

programme.title: Costa Rica: Wildlife Under the Rainbow
programme.desc: The tropical climate and varied topography of the Costa Rica have fostered exceptional biodiversity, with wildlife from both North and South America. From the peaks of volcanoes down to the Pacific and Caribbean shores, lets discover the life of 90 of the most remarkable mammals, beautiful birds, and astonishing reptiles…

programme.title: Andalusia: The Moorish Architecture
programme.desc: Andalusia, the Spanish territory has a confluence of cultures which is represented in its architecture! Visigothic, Roman, Byzantine and Arab - the structures in the region display all these influences. Between 8th and 15th century, several dynasties from Arab to Berber conquered Andalusia impacting the way of life of people. The film tells this story through beautiful edifices of Andalusia.

programme.title: Japanese Heights
programme.desc: There is more to Japans natural landscape than just Mount Fuji! Discover the countrys numerous mountains and the ethos of the people who live there. From mountains with eight peaks, mountain gods who keep locals in their awe to building snow monsters and embracing modern activities like skiing - this documentary shows the unseen side to Japan!

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The history of the British Empire colonial legacy in Northern Ireland is well known the world over but a there is a largely untold story of the the firefights between and close quarter battles exchanged between the provisional IRA, the British army and the elite SAS. Although the IRA often employed "terrorist" techniques within the city of london and on Englands mainland not much is said of the often guerilla warfare techniques of the British Special Air Service in Northern Ireland since the beginning of this conflict. In this episode we will examine how the history of the Special Air Service affected the training of every elite force after it and how the close quarter battles in Northern Ireland in the late 1970s through to the millennium shaped both special forces and resistance methods.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Westward ho! We settle in Salt Lake City, where we learn about Bringham Youngs settlement of the Utah territory and his monument at This is the Place Park. Then we dig in the dirt to find hundreds of perfectly preserved dinosaurs at the Utah Natural History museum. Well take a look at some US aviation history at the Hill Air force Base museum, and see how life was like for the Utah pioneers at Frontier Homestead State Park.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This ancient ruined city, lost to history, was one of the most powerful in the world during its prime. The architectural sophistication and sheer size will amaze. Then Journeys heads out to the deep ocean for some big game fishing. Will we land the big one or return empty handed?

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Featured in films and documentaries, the mane-less lions of Tsavo have a fierce reputation - man-eaters. Journeys embarks on a photo hunt for these legendary beasts of the bush. In the process, we witness the raw power of the ghosts in the dark.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our journey to Cuba begins in its capital city Havana, a city of architecture and sea. The sea that Ernest Hemingway loved so much, and the city that he fell in love with as soon as he saw it, so much so he decided to make his home here, today it is a museum that must be visited in his honour. A deep and profound union between men and the sea can be found in the Santeria and in Yemaya, the Dea madre of the Yoruba and of all of the Orisha, the guardian spirits of Cuba. It is the Babbalao, the person that represents the highest order of priesthood in the Santeria, who will explain to us Yemayà and the relationship that the Cubans have with the sea and underwater diving. To continue our journey between the sacred and the profane, we go along the southern coast of Cuba, to the deep waters of the Cenotes, a place that seems to be suspended between a dream and reality, where Yemayà, goddess of the sea, seems to accompany Ochun, the goddess of the freshwater rivers.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of an old well-restored English boat, and pushed ahead by the mistral wind, we sail in and around the Sulcis archipelago in Sardinia. Between the islands of SantAntioco and San Pietro, expert marine biologists dive with us down to sea-grass fields to reveal to us the mystery of the Pinna nobilis or Noble Pen Shell and its magic thread.: sea-silk. A marine biologist and the only international expert of sea-silk, Chiara Vigo uncover its secrets for us. Chiara Vigo with her special personality and philosophy of life, who has transformed the processing of sea-silk into a real art. A thread that, thanks to her, becomes gold and also prayer. A treasure to protect and preserve for future generations. A thread that cannot be sold or undersold, but that needs to be protected so as not to disappear into the depths.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were exploring the other side New York state in Buffalo and Niagara. Well take the oath of office like Teddy, at the Roosevelt inauguration site in Buffalo. Then, well take a tour of the Frank Lloyd Wright Martin house and learn about Americas most celebrated architect. We get soaked on the Maid of the Mist at breathtaking Niagara Falls, and defend the walls at Fort Niagara.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board a catamaran, we discover several islands in the Society Island archipelago, in Polynesia. Of the Island of Raiatea, hilly and volcanic, we explore the Faaroa River, the only river that you can sail down in Polynesia that is bordered by lush vegetation and fruit trees. A narrow natural passage separate the Island of Raiatea from the Island of Tahaa, both are surrounded by the same coral reef. It is on the Island of Tahaa that Brian and his wife show us their vanilla plantation and the way that it is cultivated as well as their banana, papaya, mango and rambuthan plantations. Remaining on Tahaa we go to discover the very special process of pearl cultivation of the famous Polynesian Black Pearl both on land and under the sea. A real miracle of these South Sea Islands.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Saving Auschwitz?
programme.desc: 70 years after Auschwitz Museum was founded as the memorial site of the Shoah, this site is subject to diversions, confrontations and plundering. Several attempts to exploit and rewrite its history are at work. The danger of desensitization through mass tourism, or the attempts of the local town and its citizens to simply erase the nightmare to make place for new urban landscape are real threats affecting the future of this memorial site. Today, as the last survivors are passing on, what to do with the Auschwitz site?

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: In 1968, a new form of military policing was being developed in a rural area north of Los Angeles. The Los Angeles Police Department sent an observer to this unit, and he, in turn, took this knowledge back to the LAPD. This contributed to the development of the departments ﬁ rst Special Weapons and Tactics (S.W.A.T.) team. This CQB episode takes an historical journey to examine how this incident aﬀ ected and changed police tactics around the world. Using CQBs trademark "sub-second" analysis, the program also looks at how police S.W.A.T. teams train, plan and equip themselves for the challenges of urban combat. The dramatization of a 1980s S.W.A.T. siege of a gang safe-house demonstrates the complicated challenge of protecting innocent people who might be caught in the line of ﬁ re, as well as the speciﬁ cs of the squads training regimen, how they communicated, and the special equipment they used.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this speciﬁ c combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces-and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: WW1s First Frontline Cameraman
programme.desc: Geoffrey Herbert Malins is the first war kinematographer in history. The documentary he shot during the Battle of the Somme drew over 20 million British viewers in 1916. For years controversy has raged around the film due to its disconcerting violence and overt propagandist agenda,. Now, new research has proven that most of the scenes are indeed a real minute-by-minute record of the most disastrous battle in British military history. The film is a reflexion on the history of cinema and the ability to document historical events on film.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: In 1989, CIA operative Kurt Muse was imprisoned at the notorious Carcel Modelo in Panama for his role in organizing radio transmissions against dictator Manuel Noriega. That December, an elite group of the US Delta Force breached the roof of the prison, and one of the most daring close quarter battle operations in history began. From the dramatic helicopter crash and wounding of several Delta operators to the extraction of the entire team by the 5th Infantry Division, this is prime material for CQB analysis. In this episode, CQB recreates the raid, focusing on the "sub-second" reflexes of the Delta Force team from the moment they entered the prison to their extraction from the roof of the prison by an MH-6 "Little Bird" helicopter.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Pusaugu zēns Helovīna rītā mājās atklāj reālu šausmu skatu, un drīz vien saprot, ka tā nav brīvdienu palaidnība.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Bruklinā metro vagonā atrasts nošauts atvaļināts policists. Izmeklētāji drīz atklāj, ka viņa nāve ir saistīta ar divām apšaudēm pēdējo 13 stundu laikā. Tā kā upuri šķietami izvēlēti nejauši, policija uztraucas, ka par nākamo mērķi varētu kļūt jebkurš ņujorkietis. Vitāli svarīgi ir izsekot jebkuru aizdomās turamo, pirms viņš atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Kad radinieku strīds par naudu pārvēršas dubultslepkavībā, visa Bruklina ir nomodā izgaisušās slepkavas dēļ. Dienas pārvēršas mēnešos un pēc tam gados, jo Ņujorkas policijas medības pārvēršas par bēgļa vajāšanu valsts un starptautiskā mērogā.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Kad radinieku strīds par naudu pārvēršas dubultslepkavībā, visa Bruklina ir nomodā izgaisušās slepkavas dēļ. Dienas pārvēršas mēnešos un pēc tam gados, jo Ņujorkas policijas medības pārvēršas par bēgļa vajāšanu valsts un starptautiskā mērogā.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: "Maverick" saspēles vadītāja Breta Favra slava un bagātība uzņēmusi drūmu noti: viņš iesaistījies labklājības fonda skandālā, apdraudot viņa grūtā darbā nopelnīto.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Trīsdesmit gadus pēc trim šausmīgām slepkavībām, pazīstama DNS un ķermeņa ekshumēšanas beidzot izbeidz lietu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Luiziānas naktsklubā tiek atrasts nežēlīgi nogalināts vīrietis. Ar roku rakstītā zīmīte, kas piesūcināta ar upura asinīm, vēsta: "Tu man pielaidi AIDS." Policijai ir vairāk jautājumu nekā atbilžu. Vai tas bija naida noziegums? Vai slepkava uzbruks atkal?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad vīrietis tiek noslepkavots tieši pirms Ziemassvētkiem, viņa ģimene palīdz Talsas izmeklētājiem atrast viņa slepkavas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Jaunas sievietes ķermenis tiek atrasts paslēpts niedrēs klusā parkā vairākus kvartālus no viņas mājām. Visu Kvīnsas apkaimi pārņem bailes. Pēc mēnešiem ilgas nemitīgas izmeklēšanas, pagātnes pavediens noved Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētājus pie negaidīta slepkavas.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Pēc viesuļvētras Katrīna postījumiem Ņūorleānas "Saints" uzvara Superbowl pacēla pilsētas noskaņojumu. Tomēr pēc spēles izcēlās skandāls par atlīdzībām, kas tika izmaksātas par pretinieku ievainošanu, radot jautājumus par notikušo.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Eksperti analizē smiltis, kas atrastas automašīnā pēc vīrieša pazušanas, un tas noved līdz līķim un sarežģītai slepkavības lietai.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: "Stocking Strangler" sērijveida slepkavas medības Kolumbusā beigu beigās noved pie Karltona Gerija aresta un notiesāšanas. Šaubas par viņa vainu rodas vairākus gadus vēlāk.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā nošauts vīrietis. Svešinieks ierauga iespēju, kas ir pārāk laba, lai to palaistu garām. Atlantā strīda saasināšanās beidzas ar viena vīrieša nāvi un otra nokļūšanu briesmās.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Dažas dienas pirms Jaunās tūkstošgades ieslodzītais informators zvana policijai ar noslēpumainu informāciju par slepkavību. Tas liek desmitiem izmeklētāju doties uz Ņujorkas augstceltnēm, meklējot nozieguma vietu un līķi.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu beigu boksa pasauli bija pārņēmusi alkatība un korupcija. Krāpnieks Riks Pārkers piespieda iesācēju Timu Andersonu uz cīņu pret NFL zvaigzni Marku Gastino. Andersona atteikšanās noveda pie traģiskām sekām.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Eksperti analizē saldētavā atrasto divu sieviešu līķus. Viņu priekšlaicīga nāve būtu saistīta ar kādu ļaunu plēsoņu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: No elitārās koledžas pilsētas pazūd divas sievietes. Sabiedrību pārņem panika -- ir atrasti viņu ķermeņi. Kādus ļaunus noslēpumus policija atklās, divām ģimenēm mudinot sabiedrību palīdzēt slepkavas meklēšanā un notiesāšanā?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Narkotiku darījums autostāvvietā pārvēršas apšaudē, kurā iet bojā divi vīriešu no Atlantas. Nāvessoda izpilde pie moteļa Talsā pāraug dubultslepkavībā - slepkava pamana nozieguma aculiecinieku.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Šajā sērijā kāds ietekmīgs pāris tiek atrasts nežēlīgi noslepkavots savās mājās Montgomerijā, Alabamā. Tas noticis Pateicības dienas vakarā, izmeklētājiem liekot aizsākt tūkstošiem jūdžu ilgas medības vairākos štatos.

programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Šķiet, ka uzvara ir garantēt - Stīvs piekrīt pievienoties Bandijiem ģimenes komandas boulinga mačā pret Pegijas sāncensi no vidusskolas Mimi un viņas nepatīkamo ģimeni. Bads atklāj, ka neprot spēlēt boulingu, jo izšķērdējis savu boulinga nodarbības naudu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Stīvs atgriežas mājās, izaudzējis bārdu pēc nedēļu ilga raftinga. Viņš un Mārsija sāk milzīgu strīdu par viņa nevēlēšanos to noskūt, kā rezultātā viņš pārvācas dzīvot pie Bandijiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Al, Pegija un Bads ir daļa no iepirkšanās centra softbola komandas, kas cīnās ar citu veikalu komandām. Pēc pārāk daudzu spēļu zaudējuma Als pieprasa, lai Pegija uzlabo savas softbola prasmes, pretējā gadījumā viņa tiks atlaista no komandas. Tikmēr Kellijas jaunais draugs Braiens lūdz viņai apliecināt viņam savu mīlestību, uztaisot tetovējumu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Apkārtnē ir jauns spīdeklis - Bads atved mājās pievilcīgu, brīvu, 21 gadu vecu mākslinieci Tifāniju, kurai ir sapņi par mākslas skolu Ņujorkā. Viņa patīk visiem, izņemot Mārsiju, jo Tifānija nozog arī Stīva uzmanību.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bandiju Ziemassvētki tiek pārtraukti - viņu pagalmā nosēžas Ziemassvētku vecītis ar izpletni, piesaistot apkārtnes bērnus.

programme.desc: Dvaita pārlieku reālistiskā ugunsgrēka trauksme izraisa sirslēkmi Stenlijam. Kad viņš atgriežas, Maikls uzzina, ka viņš ir Stenlija stresa cēlonis. Lai labotu situāciju, viņš piespiež biroju sevi aprunāt.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džejs nevēlas neko vairāk kā klusu dzimšanas dienu, makšķerējot pie ezera, taču ģimene vēlas viņam lielus svētkus. Savā izmisīgajā cīņā, lai visu sakārtotu, Klēra un Mičels nonāk ieslodzījumā savas bērnības pagalmā. Fils, atrodoties tirdzniecības centrā kopā ar Gloriju un Liliju, satiekas ar savu veco koledžas ienaidnieku.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ģimenes brīvdienas rančo pārvēršas par katastrofu - Dilans bildina Heiliju, Alekss tiek pie negaidīta pirmā skūpsta, viņu kovboju gids turpina aplidot Gloriju un Fils cenšas atstāt iespaidu uz Džeju.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Lilijai ir problēmas ar Mičela un Kamerona plāniem adoptēt vēl vienu bērnu.Džejs cenšas panākt, lai Menijs atzīstas medaljona zādzībā skolā. Klēra dara visu iespējamo, lai pierādītu, ka strīdā viņai bija taisnība.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Klēra savervē savu ģimeni, lai palīdzētu vākt parakstus petīcijai, lai uzstādītu stop zīmi. Glorija pazaudē ģimenes suni. Džejs palīdz Menijam mēģināt pārdot iesaiņojamo papīru skolai. KameronsMičelam atstāj nekārtību virtuvē.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Uzsākot beisbola karšu kolekcijonēšanu, Als un Stīvs pārdod Mārsijas veco lelli Bārbiju. Viņiem tā ir jāatgūst, bet viņi uzzina, ka veikals, kam viņi to pārdeva, ir aplaupīts, tāpēc viņiem būs jādodas uz Čikāgu, un jāiztaujā katrs bezpajumtnieks.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Valentīndienā Kellija sagādā kaudzi Valentīndienas aksesuāru, bet Stīvs plāno dāvināt Mārsijai ceļojumu uz Havaju salām. Kad Mārsija to no Pegijas uzzina, viņa izplāno uzdāvināt Stīvam dāvanu, izlecot no cilvēka izmēra kūkas. Pegija apdomā lēmumu par to, vai viņa saņems dāvanu, ko viņa vēlas no Ala - lai viņš pateiktu: "Es tevi mīlu".

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks un viņa čomi atdarina Pilsoņu kara ainas, un Rejs vēlas palīdzēt.

programme.desc: Maikls Valentīndienā birojā rīko vientuļu siržu ballīti, cerot, ka viņš sastapsies ar sievieti, kuru viņš satika agrāk, asins nodošanas laikā. Tikmēr Džims un Pema ietur neveiklas pusdienas kopā ar Filisu un Bobu Vansu.

programme.desc: Kamēr Fils ved Heiliju ekskursijā pa savu alma mater, Klēra dodas uz pilsētu kopā ar vīrieti, kuru viņa kļūdaini uzskata par Mičela un Kamerona geju draugu. Glorija ir satraukta un ziņkārīga par Menija sūtījumu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als dzīvo ar domu, ka nav jāmaksā par neko, kas nav pasūtīts. Viņš ar Pegiju dodas uz greznu viesnīcu nedēļas nogales atpūtā, bet tikmēr pastnieks nejauši atstāj jaunu kredītkarti, kas adresēta sunim Bakam.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Valentīndienā Kellija sagādā kaudzi Valentīndienas aksesuāru, bet Stīvs plāno dāvināt Mārsijai ceļojumu uz Havaju salām. Kad Mārsija to no Pegijas uzzina, viņa izplāno uzdāvināt Stīvam dāvanu, izlecot no cilvēka izmēra kūkas. Pegija apdomā lēmumu par to, vai viņa saņems dāvanu, ko viņa vēlas no Ala - lai viņš pateiktu: "Es tevi mīlu".

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Blēra lūdz Metiju un Sūzenu ļaut Tedam būt par viņu laulību terapeitu; Sūzena turpina savu iepriekšējo karjeru.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kad pusaudži kādā bedrē atrod jaunas meitenes līķi, Dalgliešs un Miskina ierodas Norfolkā, lai palīdzētu, un galu galā tiek ievilkti lielākā slepkavības noslēpumā.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Džeko Ārgails nomira cietumā, jo bija apcietināts par savas audžumātes slepkavību. Dr. Artūrs Kalgarijs pierāda, ka Džeko patiesībā slepkavības laikā bija kopā ar viņu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad strādnieka nāve izraisa streiku, Mērdokam rodas aizdomas, ka tas viss ir saistīts ar arodbiedrības veidošanos.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izsaukta no piekrastes mājām, lai pieprasītu savu noslēpumaino mantojumu, jaunā un ārprātīgā Peregrīna Fišere atklāj pasauli un mantojumu, ko atstājusi viņas tante Frīna.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Pēdējā sērijā Elīza atklāj, kurš un kāpēc nogalināja viņas tēvu. Galvenais aizdomās turamais ir Mozus, tomēr atklājas, ka īstais slepkava visu laiku ir bijis Hercoga acu priekšā.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam jāpieņem svarīgs lēmums par savu nākotni Daroubijā. Tikmēr Tristana nākamās darbības nosaka nejauša tikšanās ar negaidītu svešinieku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Atrodoties Londonā, Mērdoks, Ogdena un Suzanna cieš bumbas sprādzienā, ko, visticamāk, izraisīja nu jau mirusi sufražete.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Vats mēģinājumus aizsargāt dārgu rubīnu, kas paredzēts jaunam muzejam, apdraud apņēmīgi zagļi.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka sievietes nāve ir saistīta ar korumpētu mēra kandidātu, kam, iespējams, iepriekš izdevies izvairīties no atbildības par slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka izmeklēšana par noslēpumainu slepkavību var būt saistīta ar jaunu ēstuvi, kurā Higinss un Roberts ieguldījuši līdzekļus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Muzeja direktors Markuss Dupeins cenšas pārliecināt brāli Nevilu parakstīt muzeja jauno īres līgumu. Muzejs ir ģimenes mantojums. Automašīnai aizdegoties, Nevils pēkšņi mirst.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam ir jānokārto veci rēķini, kad Daroubijā atgriežas pazīstama seja, un Tristanam un Zigfrīdam ir jāatzīst savstarpējās atšķirības.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam jāpieņem svarīgs lēmums par savu nākotni Daroubijā. Tikmēr Tristana nākamās darbības nosaka nejauša tikšanās ar negaidītu svešinieku.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kādas pazudušas sievietes meita nolīgst Elizu viņu atrast. Kad lietu slēdz policija, starp Elizu un Hercogu rodas jauni saspīlējumi.

programme.title: "Sanderson Farms Championship" – 4. posms
programme.desc: The Sanderson Farms Championship is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour, played annually in Mississippi. It moved to the Country Club of Jackson in Jackson in autumn 2014, early in the 2015 season. The tournament has been part of the PGA Tour schedule since 1968, and has raised more than $7.3 million for statewide charities. Originally played at the Hattiesburg Country Club in Hattiesburg, the event moved in 1994 to Annandale Golf Club in Madison, which hosted through 2013.

programme.title: FIM Nāciju kauss – sacīkstes
programme.desc: The Speedway of Nations is a one-a-year speedway event every time held in a different country. Several national teams compete with each other, every team is represented by two riders, and there is one reserve, that can be used at any time.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Black Water
programme.desc: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: The Fire Dragon patrol, with their ever-supportive scoutmaster, is headed to Camp Rakhouta for what should be the best week of their lives. But when the "Team Spirit Stick" of the camp goes missing, the entire tradition of the camp is threatened.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Normāls trips
programme.desc: Sekojot četriem draugiem, kuri ceļo pa Ķīnu, meklējot vienu no savām bioloģiskajām mātēm. Visi satuvinās un atklāj patiesību par to, ko nozīmē zināt un mīlēt sevi.

programme.title: Manas ugunīgās kāzas
programme.desc: Dārsija un Toms sapulcina savus mīlošos, bet viedokļiem bagātos ģimenes locekļus uz kāzām kādā ekstravagantā apvidū. Svinības apdraud ne vien jaunlaulāto šaubas, bet arī negaidīta kāzu viesu nonākšana noziedznieku gūstā.

programme.title: Seifs
programme.desc: Madride, Spānija, 2010. Kamēr visa pilsēta seko līdzi valstsvienības veiksmīgai dalībai Pasaules kausa izcīņā, pārdrošu zagļu grupa meklē ceļu uz vienu no visdrošākajām un vislabāk apsargātajām vietām uz planētas.

programme.title: Ērina Brokoviča
programme.desc: Jaunajai trīs bērnu mātei, kas divreiz šķīrusies, ir tikai pamata izglītība, un viņa nevar atrast darbu, lai pārveidotu savu dzīvi. Pēc neveiksmīgas prasības tiesā pret bagātu ārstu, kura auto viņu reiz notrieca ceļmalā, Ērina konstatē, ka nav spējīga pat apmaksāt pieticīgo dzīvokli. Viņa riskē un dodas uz sava advokāta Eda Masrija kantori, lai pieteiktos darbā. Sākotnēji viņš nevēlas sievietei dot darbu, taču Ērina atsakās samierināties ar noraidījumu. Par spīti pretrunīgajam raksturam viņai izdodas šo darbu dabūt. Tobrīd Edam vēl nav ne jausmas, ka viņš pieņēmis visnozīmīgāko lēmumu viņu abu dzīvēs.

programme.title: Simona
programme.desc: Kinorežisoram Viktoram Taranskim ir apnikušas aktieru mūžīgās kaprīzes un ultimāti. Bet nu viņš ir atradis ideālu aktrisi - visskaistāko, vistalantīgāko, kas nekad neiebilst un nekad neko neprasa. Tiešām žēl, ka Simone eksistē... tikai virtuāli, nav nekas vairāk kā datora kods, nulles un vieninieki. Taču arī savus straujos panākumus Taranskis apturēt nevēlas, īstenībā neeksistējošās aktrises faniem vilšanos sagādāt negrib, tāpēc cenšas saglabāt intrigu un neatklāt patiesību cik vien iespējams ilgi.

programme.title: Seifs

programme.title: Džokers
programme.desc: Artūrs Fleks - ballīšu klauns un neveiksmīgs stand-up komiķis - dzīvo nabadzīgu dzīvi kopā ar savu slimo māti. Kad sabiedrība viņu atstumj un uzskata par ķēmu, viņš nolemj pieņemt haosa pilno dzīvi Gotemas pilsētā.

programme.title: Ananasu ekspresis
programme.desc: KĀds vīrs un viņa marihuānas tirgotājs aizbēg no slepkavām un korumpēta policista. Viņš kļuvis par liecinieku tam, kā viņa tirgotāja boss nogalina konkurentu.

programme.title: Mans draugs zombijs
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad ļoti neparasts zombijs izglābj vēl dzīvu meiteni no uzbrukuma, abi izveido attiecības, kas aizsāk visu nedzīvo pasauli pārveidojošus notikumus.

programme.desc: Otrā pasaules kara laikā atzīts poļu mūziķis Vladislavs pazaudējis kontaktu ar savu ģimeni. Situācija kļūst aizvien sliktāka, un viņš izdzīvošanas nolūkos paslēpjas Varšavas drupās.

programme.title: Stāsts par Levinu Deivisu
programme.desc: Drāma par vienu nedēļu kāda jauna folka dziedātāja dzīvē, kurš iepazīst Griničvilidžas folkmūzikas pasauli. Ar ģitāru plecā viņš cīnās ar skarbo Ņujorkas ziemu un cenšas kļūt par īstu mūziķi, saskaroties ar šķietami nepārvaramiem šķēršļiem, turklāt dažus no tiem rada viņš pats.

programme.title: Neticamais stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir F. Skota Ficdžeralda stāsts par Bendžaminu Batonu, kurš piedzimis sirmā vecumā un laika gaitā paliek aizvien jaunāks. Neparastie notikumi aizsākas Pirmā pasaules kara beigās, Ņūorleānā un sniedzas līdz 21. gadsimtam - tas ir stāsts par cilvēku, kurš tāpat kā mēs visi, nespēj ietekmēt laika ritējumu un viņa dzīve ir tikpat neparasta, cik tā var būt jebkuram no mums.

programme.title: Mans karalis. Drāma
programme.desc: Pēc nopietnas slēpošanas traumas Tonija nonākusi rehabilitācijas centrā. Atkarīga no medicīnas personāla un pretsāpju līdzekļiem, viņa velta laiku, lai atcerētos vētraino mīlasstāstu, ko piedzīvoja kopā ar Džordžio.

programme.title: Bens ir atgriezies
programme.desc: Deviņpadsmitgadīgais Bens Bērnss aizbēg no rehabilitācijas centra un negaidīti atgriežas mājās tieši uz Ziemassvētkiem. Bena māte Holija priecājas satikt dēlu, taču raizējas, vai viņš neatsāks lietot narkotikas. Turpmāko 24 stundu laikā gaismā nāk dažādi noslēpumi, un māte dara visu, lai pasargātu dēlu no lielām briesmām.

programme.title: 20. gadsimta sievietes
programme.desc: Trīs sievietes, trīs stāsti, trīs likteņi - triju paaudžu ekrāna dīvas Anete Beninga, Elle Faninga un Grēta Gērviga dzīvā un optimistiskā stāstā par sievietēm pagājušā gadsimta 70-to gadu Kalifornijā.

programme.title: Fabelmeni
programme.desc: Augot Arizonā pēc Otrā pasaules kara, jaunais Semijs Fabelmens pusaudža gados vēlas kļūt par kinorežisoru. Drīz vien viņš atklāj satriecošu ģimenes noslēpumu un pēta, kā filmu spēks var palīdzēt viņam saskatīt patiesību.

programme.title: Ciao House

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.
